name: River Boy
description:
"WAAAAAAAH" - A kappa (probably)

This was a submission for the first ever MixAndGameJam. The theme was "Dimension Change"- which meant to take one game mechanic and realize it in another dimension (3d to 2d or 2d to 3d). In the nostalgic vein of MixAndJam, I decided to take a mechanic from the very first game I ever played in my life: Super Mario Sunshine.

I didn't get very far in the actual design of the game (I got stuck having too much fun in ShaderGraph lol), but all most of the mechanics I wanted got in there! Water spittin, hovering, cleaning...

Controls:

Move : WASD 

Aim : Mouse

Spit : Left Click

Will I keep workin' on this?

I had a ton of fun this weekend, but I'm probably done workin' on this little guy for now hah..

Big shoutout to André Cardoso @andre_mc! Definitely go watch his channel for some awesome devvy wonders.
